item.title: Staycation @ Sofitel Singapore Sentosa
item.description: During Christmas 2021, we used our second complimentary Accor Plus night to book Sofitel Singapore Sentosa. (first night used at Fairmont Singapore) Check-in went smoothly and the lobby was mostly filled with families coming to stay in the resort and unwind as the year ends. We were assigned a room in the Peace Wing and soaked in the clam relaxing resort atmosphere along the way. The resort compound’s landscape and gardens is inspired by Parisâ€™ Jardin du Luxembourg.
